text: The Storm Media is a Chinese-language news media in Taiwan, headquartered in Neihu District, Taipei City. It was launched on February 18, 2014. == Overview == The founder, Zhang Guojun, was the general manager of Goldman Sachs Taipei Branch and served as a consultant to Fubon Financial Holdings after his retirement. The publisher, Wang Jianzhuang, is a professor at Shih Hsin University. == References == Category:Mass media in Asia
title: The Storm Media
